page.title: 12HEALTH
page.content: Most people want to be slim. My mum goes to a slimming club.This is what she told me. At the first visit you are weighed and measured and your "goal"weight is calculated.The club leader provides a diet booklet and explains how to follow it. When every member has been weighed, the meeting begins.First the leader calls out names and weight loss of everyone present.If however,weight has been gained in the past week,you do not have to be idenified.Next there is a discussion on various topics e.g. eating out in restaurants, at friends or on holiday, how to avoid situations which tempt you to over_eat and break your diet.It is easier to diet as a part of a group because you find others have simular problems.It must work,some people have lost three stone.
